short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add、edit、remove、import json file to storage (For Develop By Perse）

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can use the tool for local storage operations, such as adding, editing, deleting, and can also read JSON files and save them as local storage, which greatly facilitates the process of front-end development. After adding it to the Chrome browser extension program, you can select it from the top bar to perform relevant operations. The highlight is that you can drag or click to select the JSON file you want to import, and then it can be automatically imported to local storage, which is convenient for front-end development and use.
